name: myWebasto
0:
”Alexa, start myWebasto”
”Alexa, start myWebasto and turn on my heater”
”Alexa, start myWebasto and turn off my heater”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my webasto
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you to operate your Webasto parking heater simply via voice commands.

Functions:

 - Switch the parking heater on and off
 - Query temperature of vehicle interior and battery voltage
 - Query and configure timer

To use this skill you need a Webasto Connect account. Please connect this account with your Amazon account in the skill settings of your Alexa app.

If you have multiple vehicles connected to your Webasto Connect account, Alexa can only activate the control for the currently selected vehicle.
